channel.title: Why Are Women Less Likely To Become Entrepreneurs Than Men?

item.title: Why Are Women Less Likely To Become Entrepreneurs Than Men?
item.dc:creator: Lewis
item.description:
Andy:

Actually I think a degree of humbless is a strength. Arrogant people don’t listen to their customers.

Indeed. There’s got to be a stronger position with a balance of these characteristics. But knowing which ones are potentially important is key. Which is why I posted this article.

Andy:

Amy Hoy recently wrote this on the topic:https://unicornfree.com/2015/women-entrepreneurs-fail

I think Amy’s pretty cool. I do, however, disagree with the hard position the article takes. Women and men are different biologically. We are also different in the way society cultivates us. What she writes is true for both sexes. However, it doesn’t underwhelm the realities that do exist for women.

Read full topic
item.source: Why Are Women Less Likely To Become Entrepreneurs Than Men?

item.title: Why Are Women Less Likely To Become Entrepreneurs Than Men?
item.dc:creator: Andy
item.description:
Amy Hoy recently wrote this on the topic:

stackingthebricks.com

Why women entrepreneurs fail.

I’m about to break one of my very own rules: Don’t write for women. I’m a woman. I write about business. Why not write about business for women? Beca

Actually I think a degree of humbless is a strength. Arrogant people don’t listen to their customers.
